title: Ticket #3659: Example configurations from community in wiki
description:
Try to have pointers to "start-up" configurations. Place it under "Helpful guides to new users running HTCondor" on the main wiki page. Add note about this to the manual. Maybe this should go on Getting started wiki page, if the main wiki page is not the appropriate venue.

At this point, links there are most useful for people on campus grids like OSG.
check_ins:

2013-May-28 22:49   Check-in [35908]: Add pointer to HTCondorWiki for configuration examples #3659 (By Nathan W. Panike )
